DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male Female patient hypertension receive MICAMLO Combination Tablets AP start study Exclusion criterion : Patients history hypersensitivity ingredient Micamlo Combination Tablets AP dihydropyridine derivative Pregnant woman possibly pregnant woman Patients extremely poor bile secretion patient serious hepatic disorder
